title: New rune system is a joke
body:
Thanks riot now two separate systems are now one and its a disgrace.

The new rune system conjoins the mastery system and rune system into one and there is a huge issue with this, with the rune system you had two pages and for the most part it was good you only needed to that's fine, the mastery system started with many more pages this meant that each champ you commonly play had a page for each of them but now the two systems are together and you get 2 pages and 5 really bad pre-made unchangeable pages.

You see the issue now we have top buy more pages or be force to re-make a new rune page in 1 min or fork out 6300 IP for one page or pay real money 

Thanks Riot I hate you.

replies.body:
You could make an old mastery page in under 30 seconds.

All you have to do is select 6 runes, thats it. If you cant remake a rune page in under one minute that just shows you lack understanding of how your champion synergizes with the new runes.

> If you cant remake a rune page in under one minute that just shows you lack understanding of how your champion synergizes with the new runes.

If you happen to be last pick, you only have 30 seconds in Draft.

That said, expecting everyone to have perfect knowledge of the runes is kinda stupid.

I hardly expect everyone to have perfect knowledge of the runes right now, but you should be able to learn the optimal page for your champion in a few weeks after you try the runes out. 

Even 30 seconds for last pick is ample time to just select 6 runes, especially when you should know what champion you are playing already.

Well you will get a hang of it
I think the biggest problem is that you can't remember each keystone does though
So as you playing over the course of the game, you will eventually remember all of them
I reckon you only need 2 pages, depends on your roles
Like if you are a mid/adc main, 1 page will be filled with Sorcery and another is filled with Precision. Just get them ready and you only need to fix few keystones depending on your matchup. Some keystones are unchangeable. It means that no matter what AP champs you play, every AP mid always uses some specific keystones so it is quite easy though.
Good luck

Agreed. Let's not forget to mention that the new rune system is far less flexible and variable than the old system.
I consider this a downgrade to the capability of providing a unique experience for each player.

The new Runes system is actually really really Broken.

If you properly read and understand the Runes you will understand.

My suggestion with the two rune pages you can change is to have 1 AD page and one AP page.
